title: CLEVELAND PARK STREETSCAPES
description: This project funds immediate action by DDOT on a highly hazardous roadway segment of Connecticut Avenue NW from Porter Street to Macomb Street. This portion of road has been identified by DDOT and residents as having poor pedestrian safety.
justification: This segment of the road is highly congested with vehicles and pedestrians. Numerous fatalities and serious injuries have occurred here.
related_projects: KA0 CE311C, Hazardous Road Segments Pool project
